content:
Possibly the most bizarre of all daemons, Pink Horrors are the
Lesser Daemons that serve Tzeentch. These daemons possess
no head, only a squat pink-hued body with long, gangly arms
and legs. Leering faces are normally found upon the centre of
their chest, but can disappear and reappear anywhere on their
body seemingly at random.
extraSubCategories:
Awareness (Per), Dodge (Ag), Psyniscience (Per),
Speak Language (Any one).

Daemonic (TB 6), †Daemonic Presence, Fear (2),
From Beyond, Improved Natural Weapons, Natural Weapons
(Claws), Strange Physiology, Warp Instability.

Warpfire (30m; S/3/-; 1d10+10 E; Pen 6), Claws
(1d10+5; Pen 2).
†Daemonic Presence: All enemies within 10 metres of a Pink Horror suffer a -10 penalty to Willpower Tests in the area.
